duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and support to the senior executive position (CNO) responsible for all nursing and patient care functions/services within the hospital organization.
Assume responsibility for assessing, planning, coordinating, implementing, and evaluating nursing practice on a multi-unit level. Role assumes 24/7 responsibility for Director’s assigned areas.
Be accountable for ensuring high quality, safe, and appropriate nursing care, competency of clinical staff, and appropriate resource management related to patient care.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree from accredited nursing school with a bachelor’s degree in a health care related field or a BSN
